actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to authorize any officer or employee of the United States to accept the voluntary services of certain students for the United States.

summary.text: States that any officer or employee of the United States may accept voluntary service for the United States if such service is performed by a person who is enrolled as a student in an institution of higher education or a secondary school.

titles.title: A bill to authorize any officer or employee of the United States to accept the voluntary services of certain students for the United States.
